Posted By: Matthew R
[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1210987866.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1210987949.JPG[/IMG] 

215 dollars shipped and insured.  

Would also be willing to work out some kind of trade involving any of the following cards T206s Tinker portrait, Evers portrait, Chance yellow portrait Goudeys Hack Wilson, Gabby Hartnett, Billy Herman and a beater or even altered Cap Anson card.  If you are not interested in trading, but would like to sell any of these that would work too.  Trades could involve money.
